other_gear: studded leather, dogslicer, mwk dogslicer, shortbow with 20 arrows, 18 gp

sections.body: During Combat A sneak tries to ambush opponents so it can make sneak attacks, then uses Acrobatics to flank.
sections.name: Tactics

special_qualities: rogue talents (finesse rogue), trapfinding +1, weapon familiarity
name: Goblin Sneak
skills: Acrobatics +8, Climb +4, Disable Device +8, Escape Artist +8, Perception +6, Sleight of Hand +8, Stealth +12, Swim +4
combat_gear: potion of cure light wounds, potion of jump, potion of feather fall, alchemist's fire (4), smokesticks (2), thunderstones (4)
